entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is trying to help Harry Potter. He is described as plucking at his maroon sweater and squeaking in a high-pitched voice.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who is being helped by Dobby. He is described as gasping and staring at Dobby in horror.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who has been taken by some unknown entity. Dobby mentions that Ron will be missed by Harry.

relationships.description: Dobby is trying to help Harry Potter, as evidenced by his attempts to give him gillyweed and his concern for Ron's safety.
Gillyweed will allow Harry Potter to breathe underwater, as Dobby explains.
Dobby is concerned for Ron's safety and mentions that he will be missed by Harry.
